paragraphs.content: Now gather thyself in troops, O daughter of troops: he hath laid siege against us: they shall smite the judge of Israel with a rod upon the cheek.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now gather thyself in troops, O daughter of troops: he hath laid siege against us: they shall smite the judge of Israel with a rod upon the cheek.

paragraphs.content: But thou, Beth-lehem Ephratah, though thou be little among the thousands of Judah, yet out of thee shall he come forth unto me that is to be ruler in Israel; whose goings forth have been from of old, from everlasting.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But thou, Beth-lehem Ephratah, though thou be little among the thousands of Judah, yet out of thee shall he come forth unto me that is to be ruler in Israel; whose goings forth have been from of old, from everlasting.

paragraphs.content: Therefore will he give them up, until the time that she which travaileth hath brought forth: then the remnant of his brethren shall return unto the children of Israel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore will he give them up, until the time that she which travaileth hath brought forth: then the remnant of his brethren shall return unto the children of Israel.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And he shall stand and feed in the strength of the LORD, in the majesty of the name of the LORD his God; and they shall abide: for now shall he be great unto the ends of the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And he shall stand and feed in the strength of the Lord, in the majesty of the name of the Lord his God; and they shall abide: for now shall he be great unto the ends of the earth.

paragraphs.content: And this man shall be the peace, when the Assyrian shall come into our land: and when he shall tread in our palaces, then shall we raise against him seven shepherds, and eight principal men.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And this man shall be the peace, when the Assyrian shall come into our land: and when he shall tread in our palaces, then shall we raise against him seven shepherds, and eight principal men.

paragraphs.content: And they shall waste the land of Assyria with the sword, and the land of Nimrod in the entrances thereof: thus shall he deliver us from the Assyrian, when he cometh into our land, and when he treadeth within our borders.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they shall waste the land of Assyria with the sword, and the land of Nimrod in the entrances thereof: thus shall he deliver us from the Assyrian, when he cometh into our land, and when he treadeth within our borders.

paragraphs.content: And the remnant of Jacob shall be in the midst of many people as a dew from the LORD, as the showers upon the grass, that tarrieth not for man, nor waiteth for the sons of men.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the remnant of Jacob shall be in the midst of many people as a dew from the Lord, as the showers upon the grass, that tarrieth not for man, nor waiteth for the sons of men.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And the remnant of Jacob shall be among the Gentiles in the midst of many people as a lion among the beasts of the forest, as a young lion among the flocks of sheep: who, if he go through, both treadeth down, and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And the remnant of Jacob shall be among the Gentiles in the midst of many people as a lion among the beasts of the forest, as a young lion among the flocks of sheep: who, if he go through, both treadeth down, and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

paragraphs.content: Thine hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thine hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

paragraphs.content: And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the LORD, that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the Lord, that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots:

paragraphs.content: And I will cut off the cities of thy land, and throw down all thy strong holds:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will cut off the cities of thy land, and throw down all thy strong holds:

paragraphs.content: And I will cut off witchcrafts out of thine hand; and thou shalt have no more soothsayers:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will cut off witchcrafts out of thine hand; and thou shalt have no more soothsayers:

paragraphs.content: Thy graven images also will I cut off, and thy standing images out of the midst of thee; and thou shalt no more worship the work of thine hands.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy graven images also will I cut off, and thy standing images out of the midst of thee; and thou shalt no more worship the work of thine hands.

paragraphs.content: And I will pluck up thy groves out of the midst of thee: so will I destroy thy cities.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will pluck up thy groves out of the midst of thee: so will I destroy thy cities.

paragraphs.content: And I will execute vengeance in anger and fury upon the heathen, such as they have not heard.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will execute vengeance in anger and fury upon the heathen, such as they have not heard.
